title: Art House Co-Op Sketchbook Project
content:
The Artist Co-Op is hosting the Sketchbook Project #4. Sign up to be a contributor, receive a theme and a moleskin sketchbook, fill the sketchbook with your art and mail it back to put it in the Sketchbook library. Canâ€™t wait- I already ordered mine!

[http://www.arthousecoop.com/sketchbookproject/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090821092419/http:/www.arthousecoop.com/sketchbookproject/ "http://www.arthousecoop.com/sketchbookproject/")
author: azucena
